reviews.title: Marc was very good about follow up with…
reviews.text: Marc was very good about follow up with my travel plans. My only glitch was he was on a very different time zone. He was kind enough to give me a follow up email address to communicate with him with any questions. I had neglected to call my bank card about the charges, so I received a 2AM call from them.

reviews.title: Trip to Venice
reviews.text: I want to give Elijah Peterson a huge thank for all he did to work out our flights to Venice. I appreciated his professionalism and his attention to meeting our needs. Thank you Elijah!

reviews.title: Marc is my travel planning partner!
reviews.text: Marc is a true travel professional, offering efficient and polite service with unbeatable pricing for business class travel. He attentively listens to my preferences, consistently delivering tailored options that suit both me and my family. His adept use of credit card points effectively defrays costs, adding extra value to every booking. A trusted ally in travel planning, he ensures a seamless experience from start to finish, making him my go-to for all future travel needs.

reviews.title: The best service by Elijah Peterson !
reviews.text: In the recent world where we are overwhelmed with booking travel plans we are looking for help alway. Elijah Peterson is the one person that has provided the support we needed for my business and personal trip to Dublin, Ireland. Elijah was so kind, patient, and so helpful. I never thought there were travel agency's that existed like flyer-club and I am so grateful to have Elijah's support. I got the best price, the best airlines, and the best service!! I have given Elijah's name to all my network of friends and family. Personally, I will use Elijah's service for all my business and family trips. He got the job done quickly and efficiently!! Thank you so much!!

reviews.title: We used Tyler services for a last…
reviews.text: We used Tyler services for a last minute complicated trip to Germany. We had to do couple back and forward modifications. But he pull it off and on budget!!! Thanks tyler

reviews.title: Owen was on it from  the start of our…
reviews.text: Owen was on it from the start of our inquiry. Response time for our special requests were taken care of promptly. Thanks for all your help in our trip to Italy and back to SFO

reviews.title: Had the pleasure to work with Tyler…
reviews.text: Had the pleasure to work with Tyler Smith on our family trip. It was no easy feat to find seven tickets to SE Asia for the upcoming holidays but he made it happen. He was detail oriented and made great effort to know all of our needs for the trip. He took his time to ensure our wants were taken into account when presenting us with options. I would have no hesitation to ask Tyler to handle our next trip. He made the process stress free and so easy.

reviews.title: Mona Lisa was awesome and very…
reviews.text: Mona Lisa was awesome and very accommodating at finding the best price for business class from SFO to Milan. I will be keeping her number for the future

reviews.title: Monalisa Was Amazing!
reviews.text:
Monalisa Was amazing! She worked very hard to get me a great flight within my budget.  I would contact her for sure at Flyer Club! 

Using her for all my bookings in the future.

reviews.title: This was the first time I met…
reviews.text: This was the first time I met Charlesman and used Flyer-CLub.  It was a very satisfying experience and I have a very good flight to Rome and back to LA.  I will certainly use Charlestman and Flyer CLub again.

reviews.title: Definitely 5 Stars
reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of booking a trip to Rome through William Jackson at Flyer Club, from the moment I reached out to William, I was met with exceptional service, attentiveness, and professionalism.
William managed to secure business class tickets for me at an unbeatable price. His attention to detail was evident throughout the entire booking process. He took the time to understand my travel preferences and ensured that all my needs were met.

reviews.title: Marc was very helpful & patient
reviews.text: Marc was very helpful & patient. Gave me multiple great options to suit my requirements and was very contactable the whole time. Definitely my go-to guy for next time. Thanks!

reviews.title: Great feedback & response
reviews.text: Great feedback & response

reviews.title: Booked flights to Rome
reviews.text:
Was initially leery of this type of service, but Owen gave us a bunch of options and was patient when right before finalizing, I had computer issues.
Would definitely use him again.

reviews.title: Fantastic service, Forbes whitlock
reviews.text: Fantastic service, great people, Forbes Whitlock was excellent and very professional, he did everything and found the price I could afford , he still answer my questions and help me with what I need even after he sold me the tickets . I absolutely recommend him

reviews.title: Charlesman was extremely diligent and…
reviews.text: Charlesman was extremely diligent and helpful in getting great tickets for us and our extended family to Europe. We will return to purchase more tickets and do more business with your company, thanks to Charlesman!

reviews.title: At first I did not believe that this…
reviews.text: At first I did not believe that this was legitimate due to the fact the prices for business class were so good.  But Monalisa was able to get me great tickets at great prices!! I travel internationally 4 to 5 times per year and I will always use Flyer Club!

reviews.title: No Pressure
reviews.text: They were very helpful, and have me options. As well, I didn't feel any pressured sales tactics.

reviews.title: great service with great…
reviews.text: Charlesman had great service with great prices. I highly recommend as your “go to” for discounted airline tickets

reviews.title: Tyler was great!!
reviews.text: Tyler was great! He made the process very smooth and outlined clearly what to expect. I will be saving his information
